# Information on modifications compared to public data

Calcarin8, identified from the de novo TRINITY assembly of our compiled reads of *Sycon ciliatum* from Helgoland, was not included in the published predicted proteins of HBWS01. Closer inspection revealed that it was encoded on a transcript (HBWS01158424) with another ORF in the genbank transriptome, which compromised the gene mapping. The transcript HBWS01158424 was split
, the middle part between the coding regions ommited, guided by transcripts from Sycon Helgoland assembly. 
Annotation for CAH0938358 was changeda new sequence of calcarin 8 was added to transcript and peptide fasta file


In CDS.pep:
>xxxxxxxxxx|HBWS01158424b|Sycon ciliatum Calcarin 8
*

in HBWS01_just_ID_mod.fas:
>HBWS01158424
